item.description:
Join us for a fun 5K along Nantasket Beach to help raise money for a very special cause.  Keeping the Beat 4 Kids is a fundraiser for Children's Hospital Boston's Pacemaker/ICD (Implantable Cardioverter Defibrilator) Camp.  

Keeping the Beat 
April 29th 2012 MARY JEANNETTE BATH HOUSE
204 Nantasket Beach, hull ma

 

The registeration fee is $25 per person.  I have registered us as a team, so make sure you register as a team member!! Just select "Team Members- Register For Your Team". The team name is: S Shore Fitness Meetup Runners

To register for this event and for more details, click on:

http://keepingthebeat4kids.com/

We can meet as a group near the registration area at 11am.  

 

Race Day Schedule and lineup:

Date Time Event 4/29/2012 7:00am
Volunteers arrive- check in and receive assignment

4/29/2012 10:00 am Registration opens  

11:00 am Toddler Dash on beach

11:15 am Kid Fun Run starts  

11:30 noon 5K Walkers, strollers and runners needing extra time start  

12:00 noon  5K Race Starts
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet near the registration area

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Keeping the Beat, Second Annual 5K Run/Walk
